transcript.text: Shalom this is daniel john lee with our
restoration ministries for the first
time in three years i am now headed to
portland state university and i'm going
to do some open air preaching I got my
shofar with me it is the largest college
campus on in Oregon and it's here in
downtown Portland i'm now heading to the
freedom of speech area to just start
lifting up my voice and exalting oshawa
unfortunately I don't have anyone here
to record i would love to record the
preaching at least the first 10 minutes
that's all my ipad can record for
youtube but I don't have anyone to here
to hold my iPad and I'm not just going
to stand with my iPad and hold it while
I'm preaching so if anyone's out there
in portland OR around here that wants to
help me when I come out here I'm going
to come out here every Friday which is
my day off i work sunday if you thursday
at my job that fridays i have the day
off so anyway i'm going to go to the
freedom of speech area and do some
preaching that might show far to blow
and i got my Bible so here I go so just

here's the psu campus that I'll be but
